articles.title: 59th Baeksang Arts Awards 2023 Winners List: Park Eun-bin, Decision to Leave and The Glory Wins the Grand Prize - Leisure Byte
articles.description: Check out the list of all winners at the 59th Baeksang Arts Awards 2023.
articles.content: The 59th Baeksang Arts Awards 2023 (59 ) is finally here to recognise the best talents in various categories like film, television, and theatre. Hosted by the MC Shin Dong-yup, singer and actress Bae… [+2720 chars]
